name: Sockets
description: SOCKETS is a strategy game of deception and intelligence gathering, where you counter attack your opponent's robot. Each player takes a turn 'socketing' power generators, computers, missiles, and thrusters onto their robot's body. As a player takes their turn and makes their build, they can't view their opponent's screen. Once both players complete setting up and are fully equipped, the game changes to Fight Phase, where each player will use their Socket modules to observe, plan, and intercept the other robot's moves.As the battle continues, players juggle their resources, detect their opponent's actions, and use weapons to counter attack and blow their opponent to kingdom come.
